title: Conserve Creations
description: Conserve Creations is a sustainable and Zero Waste Events that promotes eco-friendly corporate gatherings to weddings.

title: Pipline Edtor
description: A web-based pipeline editor that allows users to create, edit, and manage data processing pipelines visually. Built using React.js and D3.js for dynamic graph rendering.The project demonstrates a React-based pipeline editor built using React Flow, featuring reusable node abstractions, custom styling, dynamic text node behavior, and frontendâ€“backend integration.

title: Fitbody Scan
description: Fitbody Scan website, built with React, offers an innovative InBody scan solution. Experience seamless navigation and comprehensive body analysis, empowering users to track their fitness journey with precision and convenience.

title: Junior Science Station
description: While the COVID Panademic has been spreading across the world, e-learning intiatives made an impressive way ahead causing students to learning through digital assets. Junior Science Station is more such an effort to make learning more open-source and easy.

title: todoListe
description: A simple and beautiful CRUD App built using Reactjs and Firebase SDK V9. Create new todo's and view them on the app. Also, update the status of the todo and also delete them.

title: Space Tourism Website
description: This is a solution to the Space tourism website challenge on Frontend Mentor. Frontend Mentor challenges help you improve your coding skills by building realistic projects.
